bible.derived: OT: Biblia Hebraica Stuttgartensia (BHS; revised 1990 edition). NT: Novum Testamentum Graece (Nestle-Aland Greek New Testament, 26th edition)

translations.name: Recovery Version of the Bible
translations.description: A study Bible with a modern English translation of the Scriptures from their original languages. Comparable to the English Standard Version and the New American Standard Bible.
